title: Sejuani's nerf
body: I don't understan why in the patch 5.6 Sejuani has been  heavily nerfed. In my opinion she was a tanky jungler with a powerful R  that allows a great engage such as  ww R or Sion R. Instead of Sej why riot doesn't nerf Nidalee? She is too strong with that scales and ability and she has never been nerfed enough or in the right way.

replies.body:
1) italian forum
2)the strong engage is still there, but now you have to aim somehow carefully instead of just "IM THROWIN MAH CHAINZ".

Scusa pensavo di essere in quello inglese e ho scritto in inglese, so che la R  era molto utile anche  se veniva eVitata ma cio non toglie secondo me che  non era di importanza primaria  nerfarla,anche perche era proprio su quello spell che si basava la forza del champ, anche perche danno ne fa poco a meno che uno nonla giochi ap ,ma penso che sia abbastanza  raro trovarne uno
